direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve financial transactions (subscription and redemption) with similar parameter handling and request processing.
Both methods access BLVT-related information but perform different operations (subscription vs. info retrieval).
Both methods modify the user's subscription state and can be used to verify subscription actions.
Both methods handle similar exceptions related to financial transactions and can share exception handling patterns.
Both methods involve checking and modifying user-related limits with similar control flows.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the RequestHandler for API requests.
Parameter checking is required before invoking the subscribe method to ensure valid inputs.
Both methods involve verifying subscription actions and can share similar verification logic.
